original_title: 私立花園女子校いじめ学級会シーズン2 先生の変態レズ疑惑！学級裁判編
overview: It's been a year since the nightmare class where the homeroom teacher was forced to do all she could to do shame and nipple sumo wrestling ... Not only teachers, but also athletic trainees are targeted! Order nipple twists and soft body poses from everyone in the class! Dirty a cappella singing, metamorphosis one performance, anal plug ass tug of war, etc. are also forced! A complete sequel to the previous work, a class trial of suspicion of metamorphosis lesbians has opened!
title: Absolutely Shameful Hazing at the All-Girls Academy Season 2
